name: Ethical Advocate Symbols
description:
These are some ideations of symbol possibilities for ethical tech companies to use on their websites.


I was drawn to the EA because it's actually a mirrored ash symbol which is a very recognizable and well known dipthong from latin. This makes the symbol instantly recognizable even though it's actually a mirror image of the ash ae symbol. It's simple, elegant and feels familiar.


I believe it can stand for multiple things but my favorite so far has been "Ethical Advocate" which can be considered as both a title and badge of honor given to the tech company but additionally it can be considered a reminder of the responsibility the badge requires to reflect and uphold ethical standards in all matters of business and technology.
